Sioux_Falls.Empire Mall: Empire Mall is a shopping mall in Sioux Falls, South Dakota, United States. Opened in 1975, the mall comprises more than 140 tenants (180 including carts, kiosks, hotels, ATMs, grocery stores and surrounding outdoor retail which can vary by season) in 1,341,202 square feet (124,601.7 m2) of retail space, including five anchor stores (JCPenney, Macy's, Sears, Dick's Sporting Goods, and Younkers) and a food court. Empire Mall is a huge tourist attraction in South Dakota, with more than seven million visitors annually.
